attributes.action: Place regulations on veterinary pricing and treatment
attributes.additional_details: There is no regulation for charges by veterinary practitioners. Please introduce a set consultation charge maximum and cap the amount of markup on the drugs they use.
attributes.background: I would like regulation and control on how much veterinary practices can change for animal consultation and treatment. Animals will start to suffer if individuals cannot afford to have them vaccinated and treated for problems.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Veterinary practices are private businesses, and decisions about costs for veterinary services are a matter for individual vets, not the UK Government or Parliament.
